name: vscode-css-variables
description: Autocomplete CSS Variable support CSS, SCSS, LESS, PostCSS, VueJS, ReactJS and more

cssVariables.lookupFiles.markdownDescription: Configure glob patterns for including files and folders. Read more about glob patterns [here](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/codebasics#_advanced-search-options).

when.description: Additional check on the siblings of a matching file. Use $(basename) as variable for the matching file name.

cssVariables.blacklistFolders.markdownDescription: Configure glob patterns for excluding files and folders. The extension will not scan variables in these files and folders. Read more about glob patterns [here](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/codebasics#_advanced-search-options).

when.description: Additional check on the siblings of a matching file. Use $(basename) as variable for the matching file name.

cssVariables.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server.

scripts.postinstall: cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ..
